/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with a variety of buildings and trees that add a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
